messages.1000072352: Spiral Vortex's super armour is enhanced and additional vortex can be left behind. When Normal Attack button is used, the vortex will be left behind where the character is standing and when Special Attack button is used, the vortex will be left behind as the character retreats.\n#yAdditional hit ATK (Spiral Vortex's {0}%)
